## Question 1

a.
```{r, indent="    ", message = FALSE}
library("tidyverse")

df <- expand.grid("x" = 1:10, "y" = 1:10) 
ggplot(df, aes(x, y)) +
  geom_point() +
  theme_minimal()
```

b.
```{r, indent="    ", message = FALSE}
ggplot(df, aes(x, y)) +
  geom_point() +
  theme_minimal() +
  coord_equal()
```
  
c.
```{r, indent="    ", message = FALSE}
set.seed(1)
fuzz <- rnorm(nrow(df))
ggplot(df, aes(x, y, fill = fuzz)) +
  theme_minimal() +
  geom_tile()
```
  
d.
```{r, indent="    ", message = FALSE}
set.seed(1)
fuzz <- rnorm(nrow(df))
ggplot(df, aes(x, y, fill = fuzz)) +
  theme_minimal() +
  geom_tile() +
  theme(legend.position = "none") +
  coord_equal()
```
  
e.
```{r, indent="    ", message = FALSE}

fuzz <- rnorm(nrow(df))
ggplot(df, aes(x, y, fill = fuzz)) +
  theme_bw() +
  geom_tile() +
  coord_equal() +
  theme(legend.position = "none") +
  scale_fill_distiller(palette = "Greys")
```
